paragraphs.body: This is a game about managing a squad of soldiers in a futuristic world. You will be able to manage your squad, send them on missions, and even create your own missions.

The game is divided in two parts: the management part, and the missions part. In the management part you will be able to manage your squad, and in the missions part you will be able to send your squad on missions.
